Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Damen
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Damen due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Damen due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove, #X4 Cottage Grove Express Northbound Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/47th
ShortDescription: NB 4 Cottage Grove, X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 47th, Drexel & 43rd due to street blockage at Cottage Grove/45th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove, #X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 47th, Drexel and 43rd due to street blockage at Cottage Grove/45th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Racine
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Trains bypassing Damen Station
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Damen due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Damen due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
